briefdescription.para: Removes whitespace from a string. Based on Cholla.
Reads parameters from a text file. Based on Cholla.
Reads stellar profile from an HDF5 file. The path is contained in the parameter struct, and the properties of the profile are stored in the star struct.
One-time output operation that saves the simulation units and parameters.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct units U, struct rhs_terms *rhs, double t, double *y)
memberdef.name: write_output

briefdescription.para: Writes values of important variables for one step into the output text file.
Exits if HDF5 operation was not successful.
